text: The Asian Football Confederation often referred to as just AFC, is the organization that controls Asian football. ==Regions== The AFC has 46 member associations split into four regions. ===ASEAN Football Federation=== * Australia * Brunei * Cambodia * Indonesia * Laos * Malaysia * Myanmar * Philippines * Singapore * Thailand * Timor-Leste * Vietnam ===East Asian Football Federation=== * China PR * Guam * Hong Kong * Japan * Korea DPR * Korea Republic * Macau * Mongolia * Chinese Taipei ===Central and South Asian Football Federation=== SAFF Members * Afghanistan * Bangladesh * Bhutan * India * Maldives * Nepal * Pakistan * Sri Lanka CAFF Members * Kyrgyzstan * Tajikistan * Turkmenistan * Uzbekistan ===West Asian Football Federation=== * Iran * Iraq * Saudi Arabia * Bahrain * Jordan * Kuwait * Lebanon * Oman * Palestine * Qatar * Syria * United Arab Emirates * Yemen ==Related pages== * AFC Asian Cup * AFC Champions League == Other websites == * AFC homepage Category:1954 establishments in Asia
title: Asian Football Confederation
